name: Tron Legacy BreakOut
description:
The theme for this breakout game is dedicated to the great Disney movie Tron Legacy.

Owner Rights go to Disney and Disney Corp.

Film created by Joseph Kosinski

Produced by:  Sean Bailey, Jeffrey Silver, Steven Lisberger

ScreenPlay:  Adam Horowitz and Edward Kitsis, based on a story by Horowitz, Kitsis, Brian Klugman and Lee Sternthal.

For Music: Derezzed made by the robotic band Daft Punk to which all rights go to them. While using this Youtube Account

For Art: Design by me using a pixelated using program or desktop app called Piskel

Background from here: https://www.wallpaperflare.com/legacy-of-tron-digital-wallpaper-tron-legacy-movi...

Sound Effects:

https://www.zapsplat.com/?s=8+bit+hit&post_type=music&sound-effect-category-id=

and

Instructions:

Press "R" Key to Restart the Game

For the orange disc to which is the CLU Disc, hit it 5 times to win.
